Shortcut to set LEDs permanent dark

cycle(millis=300)[source]¶

Cycle colors around every millis milliseconds

fadeToColor(led, millis, r, g, b)[source]¶

Fade LED to given RGB (0-255) in given time (0-65535).

Start Kotzmode. Interrupt with Ctrl+C

police_old()[source]¶

Start another Kotzmode. Interrupt with Ctrl+C

randomColor(led, millis=1000)[source]¶

Set all sleep milliseconds a new random color.

params: sleep: sleeptime between 2 colors in milliseconds

randomFading(led, millis=50)[source]¶

Start automatic fading mode.

params: led: led to fade millis: time between 2 fading steps

setColorHSV(led, h, s, v)[source]¶

Set permanent HSV color for LED to given HSV (H: 0-359, S+V: 0-255).

setColorRGB(led, r, g, b)[source]¶

Set permanent RGB color for LED to given RGB (0-255).

setMaster(led, master)[source]¶

Set master for LED

stop()[source]¶

Stop the Sender. Close all networkconnections and stop.

strobe(led, millisoff=80, millistotal=100)[source]¶

Start strobemode

params: millisoff: light off for this time millistotal: total time of a cycle (millison = millistotal-millisoff)

white()[source]¶

Shortcut to set LEDs permanent white (full brightness)
